summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to Land Use and Zoning; amending Sections 3.11, 3.24, 6.21, 14.2, 17.21, 17.3, 17A07, 18.3, 19.31, 20.3, 21.6, and 23.3 of the Zoning Ordinance (86300) to permit upholstering shops in the BN zone, to define "Jail" and "Woark-Release Center" and to permit Jails, work-release centers and Police precincts stations in various zones.
